movies.title: The White Snake
movies.plot: Endres wants to be more than just a farmer's son. He wants to be able to read and write, wear clothes without holes and sleep in a proper bed. He goes to the court of the King, who is said to be the cleverest man in the land. Endres becomes his personal servant and every day after dinner brings him a mysterious golden bowl. No-one knows what the bowl contains, not even Princess Leonora. When the queen's ring goes missing, suspicion falls on Endres.
movies.simplePlot: Endres wants to be more than just a farmer's son. He wants to be able to read and write, wear clothes without holes and sleep in a proper bed. He goes to the court of the King, who is said ...

biography.bio: Tim Oliver Schultz was born on July 22, 1988 in West Berlin, West Germany. He is an actor and producer, known for The Wave (2008), Systemfehler - Wenn Inge tanzt (2013) and The White Snake (2015).
biography.name: Tim Oliver Schultz

biography.bio: A tall, German actor with a constant villainous and cunning gaze in his eyes is Reiner Schone. Born in Germany on January 19, 1942, Reiner studied acting at the German National Theatre Weimar. He started his acting career in the '60s and since then has enjoyed his share of longevity in television and film. He work goes between European and western films and television series. Among his performance, Reiner is best known in films such as The Eiger Sanction (1975) starring Clint Eastwood. In television, he is best associated with episodes from Star Trek: The Next Generation, MacGyver and Babylon 5. In 1997, he appeared as the villain Shinnok in Mortal Kombat: Annihilation, the sequel to the movie based off the popular martial arts video game. Afterwards, Reiner continued darting back and forth between western and German productions. He is married and at one time moved to Los Angeles, California before moving in 2002 to Berlin, Germany where he lives now.
biography.name: Reiner Schöne

biography.bio: Frida-Lovisa Hamann is an actress, known for The White Snake (2015), Die Vierhändige (2017) and Being at Home (2014).
biography.name: Frida-Lovisa Hamann

biography.bio: Dominik Raneburger was born on February 17, 1989 in Lienz, Austria. He is an actor, known for The White Snake (2015), Die Steintaler ...von wegen Homo sapiens (2014) and L'hiver des enfants (2003).
biography.name: Dominik Raneburger

biography.bio: Jutta Fastian was born on March 18, 1969 in Paternion, Carinthia, Austria as Jutta Unterlercher. She is an actress, known for Verbotene Liebe (1995), Rote Rosen (2006) and Der Film deines Lebens (2011).
biography.name: Jutta Fastian

biography.bio: Wolfgang S. Zechmayer was born in 1962 in Vienna, Austria. He is an actor and casting director, known for Helden in Tirol (1998), Silentium (2004) and Debt of Love (1997).
biography.name: Wolfgang S. Zechmayer

biography.bio: Katinka Auberger was born in 1973. She is an actress, known for Stufe Drei (2013), Aux mains des hommes (2013) and Vision (2009).
biography.name: Katinka Auberger

biography.bio: Jan Nikolaus Cerha is an actor, known for The White Snake (2015), Gorenorrhea (2010) and SOKO Leipzig (2001).
biography.name: Jan Nikolaus Cerha

biography.bio: Rainer Frieb was born on January 25, 1949 in Starnberg, Bavaria, Germany. He is an actor, known for Zoning (1986), Uprising (2001) and Angélique (2013).
biography.name: Rainer Frieb

biography.bio: Sandro Julianó is an actor, known for The White Snake (2015) and Schwarze Kobra.
biography.name: Sandro Julianó

biography.bio: An Austrian-born actor with a set of expressive, attention-grabbing eyes, Erwin Leder is perhaps best known among European cinema and television. He was born in St. Polten, Lower Austria, Austria on July 30, 1951 and possesses a well-sized acting career spanning over 30 years. He began his career in 1975, with many of his works being in foreign films. His more notable performances have been associated with movies such as the 1981 film Das Boot wherein he portrayed a World War II U-Boat crewman obsessed with the U96's engines. Erwin also appeared as a peasant in the opening minutes of the Disney action-adventure film The Three Musketeers (1993). That same year he also appeared in Schindler's List (1993). Ten years later he would appear in another high-profile movie with his role as the Lycan geneticist Singe in Underworld (2003).
biography.name: Erwin Leder

biography.bio: Laura Antonella Rauch is an actress, known for The White Snake (2015), Wir sind Kaiser (2007) and SOKO Kitzbühel (2001).
biography.name: Laura Antonella Rauch

biography.bio: Roland Silbernagl was born on January 19, 1971 in Innsbruck, Austria. He is an actor, known for Rosenstrasse (2003), Le troisième oeil - L'ange de la vengeance (2012) and Die Toten vom Bodensee: Stille Wasser (2016).
biography.name: Roland Silbernagl

biography.bio: Rolf Silbernagl is an actor, known for The White Snake (2015) and Le rêve de Diana (2006).
biography.name: Rolf Silbernagl

biography.bio: Heinz Trixner was born on June 21, 1941 in St. Veit/Glan, Austria. He is an actor, known for Schloßhotel Orth (1996), '38 - Vienna Before the Fall (1986) and Forward. Side. Close! (2015).
biography.name: Heinz Trixner
